String.string: Ask Sonacria to help you locate the ritual.
It seems to be a teleportal to the Sanctum of Resurrection.
Climb the steps of the Temple of Sikander and look for a way to the sanctum.
What kind of place is this?
Travel to the sanctum through the {@LinkCreature:257#1501#teleportal}.
No! We won't fail, not after so long!
Eliminate the sikandari priests. Stop the ritual! [The priests will not take damage if the guards keep their food.]
Protect Isrenia until she is ready.
Defeat Kelsaik! [Kelsaik's HP has been reduced. This quest may proceed abnormally when Kelsaik is defeated.]
Speak with Avatar of Kaia again.
Speak to Kaia in Kaiator Command Center
